entities

Class BasicFlight

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.BasicFlight
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Flight

    public class BasicFlight
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic flight class with a unique number, a capacity, seats to store Bookings of passengers, and a width that specifies the number of seats per row.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicFlight(int flightNumber, int flightWidth, int flightCapacity)
      Initialize the flight with the specified number, width and capacity.

        public void setSeat(Booking theBooking)
        Place the booking in the container according the seat specified in the booking, as long as the seat of the parameterized Booking is set.
        Parameters:
